titleStmt.title: Memorials vpon the death of Sir Robert Quarles, Knight
titleStmt.author: Quarles, Francis, 1592-1644.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Cotes, for Nicholas Alsop; and are to be sold at the signe of the Angel in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
